title: Provides for grants to school districts in shortage areas to recruit and retain dental health professionals
summary: Provides for grants to school districts in shortage areas to recruit and retain dental health professionals; dentists and dental hygienist may apply for awards of up to $10,000 bonus per service year to work in school districts in shortage areas.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to establishing the children's dental health improvement act
